channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Utah Gov. Cox appealed for civility after Charlie Kirk's murder. Did America listen?

item.title: Judge Tosses Criminal Charges Against James Comey and Letitia James
item.description: The decision is a setback for the president’s efforts to wield the criminal justice system against his perceived enemies.

item.title: Drug Arrests and Gun Seizures Fell as Homeland Security Pursued Immigration
item.description: Internal documents reveal the impact on crime fighting as the Trump administration diverts special agents to its mass deportation agenda.

item.title: 8 economic insights we're grateful for
item.description: For this Thanksgiving, Planet Money and The Indicator staffers offer economic insights they're grateful for.

item.title: Trump’s Retribution Campaign Hits a Major Roadblock, and Health Care Costs Set to Surge
item.description: Plus, what a social media break can do for your brain.

item.title: A tradition for turkeys: Another presidential pardon
item.description: What is a presidential turkey pardon – and why is it happening again?

item.title: China and Japan, With Trump in the Middle, Stoke an Existential Showdown

item.title: Australian Senator Suspended for Burqa-Wearing Stunt in Parliament
item.description: Pauline Hanson, the head of the far-right One Nation party, wore the garment as a prop to push legislation to bar the garment in public places.

item.title: U.S. Air Force Searches for Fallen Reaper Drone in Yellow Sea
item.description: The MQ-9 Reaper was conducting a routine mission when it fell into the ocean on Monday near a U.S. military base in South Korea.
